mapper.select: SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#checkWelfareList()*/ DOCUMENT_NAME FROM TBL_DOCUMENT_FORM WHERE CATEGORY_CODE = 'C2' AND DOCUMENT_NAME LIKE '%신청서' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#selectApproverLine()*/ APPROVER_NAME FROM TBL_APPROVER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo }
